appName.message: CaretTab - New Tab Clock and Date

appDesc.message: A beautifully simplistic New Tab page that includes multiple clocks, date, search, quick links, and more! Fully customizable!

configureEverything.message: Click the caret icon to configure... everything!

settingsPanel.message: Be sure to check out every tab for all of the settings.

keepFree.message: Keep CaretTab free, Tip the Developer

keepFreeDesc.message: If you find CaretTab useful, consider supporting it by leaving a tip in the tip jar. Tips will help keep this clear of ads and free! The developer highly appreciates it!

supportDesc.message: If you need support or have a suggestion or other comment you can contact the developer, BlueCaret on Twitter @BlueCaret or view CaretTab on GitHub.

resetDesc.message: If you would like to reset all settings back to the default, you can use the following button (refresh the page after).

credit.message: CaretTab is designed and coded by JWH Design, LLC (BlueCaret) and is licensed under the MIT License.

disclaimer.message: CaretTab will not be liable for any issues that may arrise due to the accuracy of this extension. If you're late to work because the time shown was wrong, it's all on you.

primaryClockDesc.message: Shows the primary clock in the middle of the page.

clockStyleDesc.message: Switch between a digital and analog clock (brackets will be hidden if enabled).

secondsDesc.message: Shows the seconds on the primary clock.

meridiemDesc.message: Shows AM/PM on the primary clock.

militaryDesc.message: Uses a 24 hour clock versus a 12 hour (disables meridiem).

delimiterDesc.message: Shows a seperator between numbers on all clocks.

timezoneDesc.message: Choose a timezone for the primary clock (the default is your local timezone).

secondClockDesc.message: Shows an additional clock below the primary clock.

secondClockTimezoneDesc.message: Choose a timezone for this clock.

secondClockLabelDesc.message: Enter a label for this clock (leave blank for none).

thirdClockDesc.message: Shows an additional clock below the primary clock.

thirdClockTimezoneDesc.message: Choose a timezone for this clock.

thirdClockLabelDesc.message: Enter a label for this clock (leave blank for none).

fourthClockDesc.message: Shows an additional clock below the primary clock.

fourthClockTimezoneDesc.message: Choose a timezone for this clock.

fourthClockLabelDesc.message: Enter a label for this clock (leave blank for none).

timeDisclaimer.message: Note that display of the primary clock and additional clocks is based on the time and timezone your computer is set to. The detection of your current timezone is pretty much an educated guess and may not reflect your actual timezone, thus causing the additional clocks time to be off. Currently CaretTab is detecting your current timezone to be:

dateDesc.message: Shows the date in the middle of the page.

dayDesc.message: Shows day of the week (only applies if 'short form' is off).

yearDesc.message: Shows the year with the date.

shortFormDesc.message: Shows the date in a short format.

showDelimiterDesc.message: Shows a seperator between numbers on the short form date.

dateFormatDesc.message: Determines how the date is shown.

weekNumberDesc.message: Shows week number below the date.

weekLabelDesc.message: Choose a label to show next to the week number.

quickLinksDesc.message: Shows a custom quick link at the top of the page.

searchBoxDesc.message: Shows a search box above the time.

searchEngineDesc.message: Choose a search engine to use with the search box.

customMessageTextDesc.message: Enter text for the custom message.

bracketsDesc.message: Shows brackets around the primary clock and date (hidden if analog clock is on).

tabTitleDesc.message: Choose what to display in the New Tab title (shows on the tab itself as well as in the browsers title bar).

customTabTextDesc.message: Enter text for the custom tab title.

languageDesc.message: CaretTab supports multiple languages that are automatically translated based on your browser's settings (the ability to manually set the language in the extension will come later). Current supported languages: English, French, Chinese (Simplified & Traditional), Japanese, German.

scaleDisplayDesc.message: Change the size of the elements. If items start to overlap, reduce the size.

animationDesc.message: Animates all elements on page load.

dimDelimiterDesc.message: Makes the delimiter 50% transparent (only applies if blink delimiter is off).

blinkDelimiterDesc.message: Blinks the delimiter on the primary clock.

hideSettingsButtonDesc.message: The settings button opens the settings box. Enable this to hide the icon. You can still open settings by clicking in the top-right corner of the page.
